meanings.definition: The outer rim of the ear that is opposite the helix.
meanings.sent1: The antihelices of his ears were more prominent than his helix.
meanings.sent2: She gently touched the antihelices of her baby's ears.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child pretended to have antennas on his antihelices.
meanings.sent4: Her earrings dangled elegantly from her antihelices.
meanings.sent5: The wind whispered secrets to her through her antihelices.

meanings.sent1: The doctor examined both antihelices carefully.
meanings.sent2: The antihelices of the twins looked very similar.
meanings.sent3: The antihelices on the diagram were color-coded for clarity.
meanings.sent4: In the sculpture, the artist emphasized the antihelices to create depth.
meanings.sent5: The antihelices of the headphones provided a snug fit.
